allow: Bash(node -e "const sqlite3 = require(''sqlite3'').verbose(); const db = new sqlite3.Database(''./database_new_2025-09-25T08-54-04-778Z.db''); db.all(''SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=""table""'', (err, rows) => { if(err) console.error(err); else console.log(JSON.stringify(rows, null, 2)); db.close(); });")
